channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 2023年の興行動向：観客は快適さを求め、バービー、テイラー・スウィフト、スーパーマリオブラザーズ・ムービーを見に集まり、スーパーヒーロー映画はほとんどスキップした（Brooks Barnes/New York Times）
item.description:
Brooks Barnes / New York Times:
Box office trends in 2023: audiences sought comfort, flocking to see Barbie, Taylor Swift, and The Super Mario Bros. Movie, and mostly skipped superhero movies  —  Movie audiences flocked to Taylor Swift, “Barbie” and “Oppenheimer” but were cooler toward returning superheroes like the Flash, Captain Marvel and Aquaman.

item.title: Amazon Prime Videoは1月29日から広告を表示し始めるが、広告を表示しないために月額2.99ドルを追加で支払うオプションもある（Chris Welch/The Verge）
item.description:
Chris Welch / The Verge:
Amazon Prime Video will start showing ads starting January 29, with an option for customers to pay an additional $2.99 per month to avoid the ads  —  Earlier this year, Amazon announced plans to start incorporating ads into movies and TV shows streamed from its Prime Video service …

item.title: 警察記者をNY市警本部から追い出すというNY市の計画に、主要報道機関が苦情の書簡に署名、NY市はより多くの報道機関が警察を取材できるようになるとしている（Erin Nolan/New York Times）。
item.description:
Erin Nolan / New York Times:
Major outlets sign a letter complaining about NYC's plan to move police reporters out of NYPD HQ; NYC says the move would allow more outlets to cover the police  —  Mayor Eric Adams said that the move would allow more outlets to cover the police, but critics said it was another blow to transparency.

item.title: ニールセン：アメリカの2歳から11歳の視聴者におけるYouTubeのシェアは、2021年9月の29.4％から2023年9月には33％に急上昇、一方Netflixは25％から21％に低下（Jessica Toonkel/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Jessica Toonkel / Wall Street Journal:
Nielsen: YouTube's share of US viewership by 2- to 11-year-olds jumped from 29.4% in September 2021 to 33% in September 2023, while Netflix fell from 25% to 21%  —  Major streaming services test releasing children's content on YouTube and cut back on fare for kids

item.title: 2023年の最も魅力的な記事のリスト：CNNが最多で、「大惨事」「追悼」「人と人とのつながり」が上位にランクイン（チャートビートブログ）
item.description:
Chartbeat Blog:
A list of 2023's most engaging stories: CNN had the most entries on the list, and most prominent themes were “catastrophe”, “memorial”, and “human connection”  —  Our 2023 edition of The Most Engaging Stories of the year reflects a year in which catastrophes …

item.title: ファイリングパラマウント・グローバルの親会社ナショナル・アミューズメンツは2022年12月、ハッカーに82,128人分の情報を盗まれるデータ漏洩に見舞われた（Zack Whittaker/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Zack Whittaker / TechCrunch:
Filing: Paramount Global parent company National Amusements experienced a data breach in December 2022, in which hackers stole information on 82,128 people  —  National Amusements, the cinema chain and corporate parent giant of media giants Paramount and CBS, has confirmed it experienced …

item.title: 情報筋Reddit、2023年の広告収入は前年比20％以上増の$800M強と予想、情報筋によるとRedditは2023年1-9月までは黒字でなかったとのこと（The Information）
item.description:
The Information:
Sources: Reddit expects 2023 ad revenue to grow 20%+ YoY to slightly over $800M; a source says Reddit was not profitable through the first nine months of 2023  —  If the market for initial public offerings recovers in the new year, one company that aims to go public early on is Reddit.

item.title: Goodreadsの現在の闘争的な文化は、サービスが始まった精神に反しており、それを修正するには、ユーザーを監視するためのより人間的なモデレーションが必要である（Maris Kreizman/New York Times）。
item.description:
Maris Kreizman / New York Times:
Goodreads' current combative culture is antithetical to the spirit in which the service began, and fixing that requires more human moderation to monitor users  —  If you have not kept up with the latest scandal in the world of young adult publishing, it is a doozy.

item.title: セバスチャン・ライへのインタビュー：父親でありメディア王であるジミー・ライの偽装裁判、アップル・デイリーを閉鎖するために香港がどのように「法律を武器化」したか、その他（Helen Davidson/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Helen Davidson / The Guardian:
An interview with Sebastien Lai about his father and media tycoon Jimmy Lai's sham trial, how Hong Kong “weaponized the law” to shut down Apple Daily, and more  —  Sebastien Lai hasn't spoken to his father in three years, but says he supports the stance the veteran pro-democracy activist has taken

item.title: 他の出版社が物議を醸しそうな本を出版することで知られるスカイホース出版が、保守系出版社レグナリー・パブリッシングを買収する契約を締結（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
Skyhorse Publishing, known for releasing books other houses consider too controversial to publish, signs a deal to buy conservative press Regnery Publishing  —  An independent publishing company known for releasing books with opposing political viewpoints is buying Regnery, a well-known conservative press.

item.title: 年の書籍、映画、音楽、1923年の録音物が1月1日に米国でパブリックドメインとなり、D.H.ローレンスの『チャタレイ夫人の恋人』（ジェニファー・ジェンキンス／デューク大学スクール...）
item.description:
Jennifer Jenkins / Duke University School of Law:
Books, movies, and music from 1928 and sound recordings from 1923 enter the US public domain on January 1; works include D.H. Lawrence's Lady Chatterley's Lover  —  Director, Duke Center for the Study of the Public Domain  —  Please note that this site is only about US law; the copyright terms in other countries may be different.

item.title: 情報筋DisneyとRelianceは先週、インドでのメディア事業を統合するための拘束力のないタームシートに調印、Relianceは51％の株式の過半数を支払う（The Economic Times）。
item.description:
The Economic Times:
Sources: Disney and Reliance signed a non-binding term sheet last week to merge their media operations in India, with Reliance paying for a majority 51% stake  —  Kevin Mayer, a former Disney executive brought back in July by chief executive Bob Iger as an adviser to help him navigate …

item.title: ミッキーマウスとミニーマウスの初期バージョンは1月1日にパブリックドメインとなる。
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
The earliest versions of Mickey and Minnie Mouse enter the public domain on January 1, as Disney's copyright suits have slowed to a trickle in recent years  —  Dan O'Neill was 53 years ahead of his time. … In his underground comic book, “Air Pirates Funnies,” the lovable mouse …

item.title: APニュースギルドが19ヶ月以上の交渉の末、3年契約で合意に達し、昇給とAIの「より危険な側面」に対する保護を確保 (@apnewsguild)
item.description:
@apnewsguild:
The AP News Guild reaches an agreement on a three-year deal after 19+ months of bargaining, securing raises and protection against “riskier aspects” of AI  —  After more than 19 months of bargaining, the @APNewsGuild has reached an agreement with @AP on a three-year deal. [image]

item.title: ある調査によると、YouTubeには133億2500万本の動画があり、そのうち2023年には40億本以上がプラットフォームにアップロードされ、YouTube動画の中央値は39回再生されていると推定されている（イーサン・ザッカーマン）。
item.description:
Ethan Zuckerman:
A study estimates that there are 13.325B videos on YouTube, of which 4B+ were uploaded to the platform in 2023, and that the median YouTube video has 39 views  —  I got interested in this question a few years ago, when I started writing about the “denominator problem”.
